name: A Woman's Duty
description:
Does Your Husband Know You're Killing Zombies??

A Woman's Duty is a 1950's inspired satirical zombie beat 'em up based around subverting stereotypes in a comedic manner. Tired of waiting around at home and stuck with the same routine everyday? A zombie apocalypse might just be the thing you're waiting for!

Beat up zombies using a vast array of weapons! Including and not limited to: your trusty frying pan, the MotherSucker vacuum, and even your fridge?! Yes! Everything you use for your boring chores could finally be put to good use!

Controls
  • Movement: W, A, S, D
  • Light Attack: Left Mouse Click
  • Heavy Attack: Right Mouse Click
  • Interaction (Pick up weapons, set up traps): E
  • Drop Weapons: E (while weapon in hand)
  • Swap Weapons: Q

Gameplay note: Environmental weapons must be charged (e.g. kettle). Once charged, their special attack function must be used before the timer runs down, after which they act as regular weapons (e.g. frying pan), and must be recharged.
